definition: The word "kunstvoll" refers to something that is skillfully crafted or executed, often characterized by intricate details and artistic finesse. It is commonly used to describe various forms of creative works, such as paintings, sculptures, architecture, or craftsmanship. This term emphasizes the high level of artistry and craftsmanship involved in the creation of the object or the execution of a particular technique.

examples.german: Sie bewunderte das kunstvoll geschnitzte Holz
examples.english: She admired the intricately carved wood

examples.german: Der Maler schuf ein kunstvoll gestaltetes Gemälde
examples.english: The painter created an artistically designed painting

examples.german: Die Tänzerin führte eine kunstvoll choreografierte Performance auf
examples.english: The dancer performed an intricately choreographed routine

examples.german: Das kunstvoll verzierte Schmuckstück war ein echter Blickfang
examples.english: The intricately adorned piece of jewelry was a real eye-catcher

examples.german: Der Architekt entwarf ein kunstvoll gestaltetes Gebäude
examples.english: The architect designed an artistically crafted building
